data.message: Don't support this in any way

replies.message: See.... All this person said was the he didn't support this... HOW IS THAT HATE? Come on man, you're part of the problem, gay or straight.
Yeah and I bet you support our soldiers going to war don't ya.
world don,t need to , about your gay
I love you hypocrites who complain and stay on facebook.  The owner is openly about equality and he is an atheist.  Do us a favor and leave...stick to your word for a change.
Why is it if anyone says they "don't support" something, liberals say it means we are HATERS?   Do no not comprehend the different between opinions, non-supporting, and HATE?
Actually you do support it Armando....by using Facebook.  Thank you so much, we appreciate your support.

If facebook is imposing its gay agenda that is no good . I am a believer in the message of love through the salvation of Christ Jesus and the principles of faith that are the catalyst toward the greatness this county has accomplished over the last 200 + years .ChristianAmerican@facebook would be  nice.
ALL the SATAN worshiper say they r ATHEISTS--so dont fall 4 that fake!!
Erick that is what I was thinking I like the social network name! People call christians with morals hatersin truth The world is blind by following everyone else when We simply need to follow Christ!

Erick and Michael. Facebook is for the whole world, not just Christians and not just for Americans. Why do we need to "simply follow Christ" ? Leave people to be who they truly are,  you can't change them. And if you truly believe Christ's message of love this would never be a problem for you.
I don't hate anyone it what they do  god don't like it read your bible

I don't hate anyone.--I never pick on the sick or disabled.--I always felt that they should be left alone with the misery they have to live in knowing that they never can change into what I consider normal.--not something pushed by the so called liberal people in this country...NO OTHER AMNIMALS IN THE WORLD ACCEPT THEM AS ANYTHING AT ALL.--if I offend? sorry.--but that's who I am and that's what I think.
